0.text: Text messages will appear on the screen. The object is to keep them from piling up to the top of the screen.
To clear a text message you must identify the sender as a bully or a friend.
Click on the friendly, green message below to select it.

1.text: Click the Friend button to correctly identify the sender and clear the message

2.text: If you identify a message incorrectly, it turns grey and you will not be able to remove it from the screen.
Select the friendly message on top.

3.text: Click the bully button to incorrectly identify the sender as a bully.

4.text: As you play, the messages will appear at a faster rate. When the messages reach the top of the screen your game is over.
